author: Julio Mena
title: Se tendr√° un d√≠a agradable en Quintana Roo - Quadratin Quintana Roo
text:
CANC√öN, QRoo, 3 de enero de 2024.- Se esperan temperaturas m√≠nimas de 14¬∞ en las zonas rurales del estado y m√°ximas de 28¬∞ con sensaciones t√©rmicas que superaran los 30¬∞ a la espera de que en los pr√≥ximos d√≠as comencemos a sentir los efectos del frente fr√≠o 22. Continuar√° cielo parcialmente nublado con incremento de nublados durante el d√≠a, poca probabilidad de precipitaciones sobre el Estado, las temperaturas ser√°n c√°lidas a calurosas durante el d√≠a y templadas a frescas por la noche y madrugada principalmente en las zonas rurales del Estado.
D√≠a con sol y buen tiempo en Canc√∫n
Se esperan temperaturas m√≠nimas de 19¬∞ y m√°ximas de 30¬∞ con una sensaci√≥n t√©rmica de 34¬∞ con cielos parcialmente nublados, poca probabilidad de lluvia, caluroso a templado, viento del este y sureste de 15 a 25 km/h con rachas m√°s fuertes.
Condiciones calurosas en Isla Mujeres
Se tendr√° un d√≠a parcialmente nublado, poca probabilidad de lluvia, caluroso a templado, viento del este y sureste de 15 a 25 km/h con rachas m√°s fuertes, con temperaturas m√≠nimas de 19¬∞ y m√°ximas de 30¬∞ con una sensaci√≥n t√©rmica de 34¬∞, se tendr√°n mareas altas a las 13:00 hrs.
Saldr√° el sol en Solidaridad
Se espera un d√≠a con poca probabilidad de lluvia, caluroso a templado, viento del este y sureste de 15 a 25 km/h con rachas m√°s fuertes, con temperatura m√≠nimas de 19¬∞ y m√°ximas de 28¬∞ y sensaciones t√©rmicas de 32¬∞.
Nublado pero sin lluvia en Tulum
Se prev√© una temperatura con m√≠nimas de 17¬∞ y m√°ximas de 28¬∞ con sensaciones t√©rmicas de 32¬∞, cielos parcialmente nublados, poca probabilidad de lluvia, caluroso a templado, viento del este y sureste de 15 a 25 km/h con rachas m√°s fuertes.

author: EFE
title: Una ONG denuncia la muerte de 14 personas en una z√≥diac al sur de Canarias
text:
Al menos catorce personas han muerto ahogadas en una z√≥diac cuyos ocupantes llevan pidiendo auxilio desde las 14.00 horas de este jueves desde un punto del Atl√°ntico situado a unos 55 kil√≥metros de Cabo Bojador, en la costa marroqu√≠ del S√°hara Occidental, al sur de
[Canarias](/tags/islas-canarias/), porque su barca se desinfla y se hunden.
Es la denuncia que realiza la activista Helena Maleno, fundadora de Caminando Fronteras, ONG que lleva toda la tarde de este jueves en contacto con los n√°ufragos y que ha transmitido su posici√≥n a las autoridades espa√±olas y marroqu√≠es para que movilicen medios de rescate. Por la localizaci√≥n del incidente, ha asumido la emergencia Rabat.
Maleno ha facilitado a EFE una foto enviada por los supervivientes que todav√≠a siguen a flote, una imagen nocturna y borrosa en la que se ve a entre seis y siete personas sentadas a horcajadas sobre un flotador de una neum√°tica, doblado y medio deshinchado.
Y tambi√©n un audio que le ha remitido una de las ocupantes de la patera. En √©l se escucha a una mujer decir en franc√©s: "Estamos aqu√≠, Helena. Soy una mujer embarazada de nueve meses, estoy en el flotador (de la z√≥diac). Todos los chicos del medio (de la embarcaci√≥n) han desaparecido, la gente est√° desapareciendo, hasta ahora no hemos visto a la Marina".
"Toda la gente est√° desapareciendo. ¬°Por favor ay√∫dennos, ay√∫dennos! ¬°Estamos aqu√≠, ay√∫dennos! Estamos sentados as√≠ en el flotador (se refiere a la imagen que adjunta con el audio). Es muy peligroso, el agua est√° entrando", se lamenta la mujer
Helena Maleno ha explicado a EFE que, seg√∫n la informaci√≥n que han recabado sobre esa neum√°tica, se trata de un grupo de 58 personas que salieron el mi√©rcoles desde la costa del Sahara hacia Canarias y que ahora se encuentran al suroeste de Cabo Bojador.
Entre ellos, a√±ade, hay siete mujeres (incluyendo a la embarazada) y dos ni√±os.
La portavoz de Caminando Fronteras denuncia que, hasta el momento, Marruecos no ha hecho llegar ayuda a los ocupantes de esa neum√°tica, ni tampoco Salvamento Mar√≠timo espa√±ol ha intervenido.
Por eso, expresa su temor a que ocurra lo mismo que el 21 de junio, cuando varias personas murieron al hundirse una z√≥diac al sur de Gran Canaria despu√©s de pasar toda la noche esperando a que llegara una patrullera de Marruecos, porque la emergencia la hab√≠a asumido el Centro de Coordinaci√≥n de Salvamento de Rabat.
Y ello, a pesar de que un barco de rescate espa√±ol hab√≠a estado a solo una hora de distancia de navegaci√≥n de ellos, socorriendo a otra patera, cuando ya se conoc√≠an sus coordenadas.
Ese suceso dio lugar una denuncia de la Fiscal√≠a de Canarias por presunto delito de omisi√≥n del deber de socorro contra los responsables del operativo en Espa√±a, denuncia que desde este verano instruye un Juzgado de Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, que ha declarado secretas las actuaciones.

author: KHQA Staff
title: Macomb Fire Dept. emphasizes need for smoke alarms after structure fire on W. Calhoun St.
text:
Macomb, Ill. (KHQA) ‚Äî After a structure fire on West Calhoun Street, the Macomb Fire Department would like to remind residents the importance of smoke detectors and that the fire department provides free smoke detectors to residents.
At 8:17 p.m., Wednesday, December 18th, the Macomb Fire Department was dispatched to a structure fire at 809 W. Calhoun St with reports of heavy black smoke coming out of the basement windows.
The first arriving units arrived on scene at 8:20 p.m. and observed smoke and flames out of the basement windows. The on-duty crew began extinguishing the fire from the outside before transitioning to an interior attack.
The fire was contained to one bedroom in the basement and the fire was declared "under control" at 8:50 p.m.
Fire investigators processed the scene and cleared at 11:30 p.m. No firefighters or civilians were injured.
No smoke alarms were observed within the residence, and none were sounding at the time of the fire department's arrival. The structure sustained fire, smoke, and water damage throughout and has an estimated loss of $50,000.
The fire cause is undetermined and remains under investigation by the Macomb Fire Department.
The Macomb Fire Department wants to again remind citizens that smoke detectors are essential safety devices that play a crucial role in protecting lives and property by providing early warning of smoke or fire. The fire department has partnered with the Illinois Fire Safety Alliance and the "Be Alarmed!" program to provide smoke detectors free of charge to residents.
The Macomb Fire Department would like to thank McDonough County Communications Center, Macomb IL Police, Lifeguard Ambulance Service of Illinois, City of Macomb Public Works, and Ameren IL for their assistance with the fire.

author: @AleteiaEN
title: Christian children of Jerusalem walk Via Crucis for peace
text: Join our Lenten Campaign 2024. [PLEASE MAKE A DONATION TO ALETEIA](https://aleteia.org/support-aleteia/?utm_campaign=easter2024&utm_content=cta&utm_medium=inread_box&utm_source=en_aleteia) Decked in white scarves embroidered with doves and prayers, more than 1,000 Christian children, parents, and teachers gathered on Jerusalem‚Äôs Via Cruicis to walk ‚ÄúThe Way of Peace‚Äù on February 23. The procession, which drew participation from local Christian schools of Jerusalem, traveled the City‚Äôs storied streets as the children prayed for peace in the Holy Land. [According to Custodia](https://custodia.org/en/news/crucis-thousand-children-jerusalem-walk-down-way-peace) ‚Äì the website of the Custody of the Holy Land ‚Äì the route began before the Chapel of the Condemnation, the site where a statue of Jesus Christ was vandalized in 2023. There, Fr. Ibrahim Faltas, Vicar of the Custody of the Holy Land and Director of the Terra Sancta Schools, spoke on the importance of the procession: ‚ÄúWe are here to invoke peace,‚Äù Fr. Ibrahim explained. ‚ÄúThis is why we wanted to call today‚Äôs Via Crucis ‚ÄòThe Way of Peace‚Äô and a white dove was printed on the scarves distributed to all the participants. These children and young people are here to pray for all their brothers and sisters who are in Gaza and who are suffering and imploring that this terrible war ends.‚Äù The procession then followed the path of the Via Crucis, which is said to follow the same steps that Jesus took on his way to the Crucifixion. At each of the 14 Stations of the Cross, two children released two white doves, save for the final stations which concluded in St. Saviour‚Äôs Church. Br. Francesco Patton, Custos of the Holy Land, addressed those who participated in the procession from the pulpit: ‚ÄúThere is no stronger prayer for peace than the one said on the route that remembers the Passion and death of Jesus ‚Ä¶ It was a Via Crucis that also had the intention of exhorting our children to remain resolute in hope and also to express solidarity with the children of Bethlehem and the Palestinian Territories, whose families are without work. At a time when it seems that men are unable to agree, we have to knock more insistently on God‚Äôs door with our prayer, so that he can bring those who must and can find a solution to this war back to reason.‚Äù

author: Noticias RCN
title: Tensi√≥n en La Casa de los Famosos Colombia 2025: se present√≥ una fuerte pelea entre dos participantes | Noticias RCN
text:
Tensi√≥n en La Casa de los Famosos Colombia 2025: se present√≥ una fuerte pelea entre dos participantes
Los participantes se dijeron de todo e, incluso, Yina Calder√≥n tuvo que intervenir. ¬øQu√© fue lo que ocurri√≥? No se pierda el video.
Noticias RCN
04:26 p. m.
Unirse al canal de Whatsapp de Noticias RCN
Este 9 de abril volvi√≥ la din√°mica de las 'etiquetas' a La Casa de los Famosos Colombia 2025 y, como siempre ha sucedido, se desataron desacuerdos que terminaron en fuertes cruces verbales.
Y es que, en esta oportunidad, salieron palabras como "marioneta" y "conveniente" y los participantes tuvieron que seleccionar a un compa√±ero para asignarle esa caracter√≠stica y explicarle por qu√©.
Por lo tanto, en medio del ejercicio, dos participantes se dijeron de todo y, antes de la jornada de nominaci√≥n, dejaron la tensi√≥n muy arriba.
¬øCu√°les fueron los participantes que protagonizaron una dura pelea en La Casa de los Famosos Colombia 2025? Ent√©rese aqu√≠ en Noticias RCN de todos los detalles.
En video: as√≠ fue la dura pelea que se present√≥ en La Casa de los Famosos Colombia 2025
Cuando se estaba llevando a cabo la din√°mica de las 'etiquetas', Camilo Trujillo sac√≥ un papel en el que dec√≠a "marioneta" y tom√≥ la decisi√≥n de decir que 'La Toxi Coste√±a' era as√≠. En consecuencia, la cantante e influencer explot√≥ contra √©l.
"La marioneta m√°s grande que tiene esta casa eres t√∫, que no tienes personalidad. Rid√≠culo, que lo √∫nico que has hecho aqu√≠ es estar detr√°s de La Liendra", dijo 'La Toxi Coste√±a'.
"Por eso es que te tienes que matar en las pruebas dejando hasta las rodillas porque no tienes m√°s capacidades. Hablador de copa, est√°s bravo porque quieres que en la placa siempre estemos nosotras, rid√≠culo", agreg√≥.
Tras esas fuertes palabras, Camilo Trujillo le respondi√≥ que ella hace lo mismo porque se la pasa detr√°s de Andr√©s Altafulla. Adem√°s, le record√≥ que apoy√≥ al cantante luego de que √©l decidi√≥ gastarse una parte del presupuesto para comprar una salvaci√≥n.
De esa manera, debido a las duras cr√≠ticas que se emitieron, Yina Calder√≥n y Emiro Navarro intervinieron para apaciguar y hacerles caer en cuenta de que podr√≠an nominarlos por no tratarse con respeto.
¬øHabr√° consecuencias tras esta fuerte pelea en La Casa de los Famosos Colombia 2025?
Hasta el momento, el 'jefe' no se ha pronunciado sobre esta fuerte discusi√≥n que se present√≥ en La Casa de los Famosos Colombia 2025. Sin embargo, en caso de que considere que se pasaron los l√≠mites, podr√≠a llegar a anunciar una decisi√≥n durante la gala de este 9 de abril.
Con√©ctese con la pantalla del Canal RCN y con la aplicaci√≥n digital que puede descargar aqu√≠ para conocer el desenlace.

author: Valley City Times-Record
title: Woongjin Thinkbig‚Äôs ARpedia Wins ‚ÄòCES Innovation Award‚Äô for the Third Consecutive Time, A Global Leading EduTech Solution Makes Its ‚ÄòMark‚Äô | User | times-online.com
text: - Recognized for excellence in augmented reality technology, apps, and device sets. - To be showcased at the CES 2024 booth... with a new Disney product launch planned for the first half of the year. Woongjin Thinkbig's ARpedia, a global edutech product, has won the 'CES 2024 Innovation Award', marking the first time a Korean educational company has achieved this honor three times in a row. Leading the global education market as a pioneering edutech solution, ARpedia has demonstrated its unique augmented reality technology and innovation. ARpedia, developed by Woongjin Thinkbig, one of Korea's leading edutech companies, is an 'Interactive Book' that provides a three-dimensional reading experience by bringing characters and illustrations from books to life through augmented reality (AR) technology. In Korea, it's a popular series with over 6 million individual books sold. Internationally, it has proven its market potential with contracts to supply at least 80,000 sets annually in the Chinese-speaking region (China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Macau). This achievement is largely attributed to the global recognition of ARpedia's unique technology and educational effectiveness. At CES 2024, ARpedia won the 'Mobile Devices and Accessories' innovation award, securing its third consecutive title. This particular win is noteworthy as it acknowledges the excellence of ARpedia in all aspects of its set, including augmented reality technology (CES 2023, AR/VR category), apps (CES 2022-2023, Mobile Apps category), and devices (CES 2024). Woongjin Thinkbig plans to introduce ARpedia to business representatives and visitors from various countries at CES 2024. Attendees will have the opportunity to explore all series that comprise the ARpedia set and learn in detail about the products' features and usage. Furthermore, Woongjin Thinkbig is set to launch a new reading series, 'Disney Interactive Reading', in the first half of this year, based on a licensing agreement with Walt Disney. The initial marketing strategy will focus on Asian countries, where there is high demand for English reading education. Sam-rak Choi, the head of Woongjin Thinkbig's EduTech Research Institute, commented, "ARpedia is sought after by companies and educational industry representatives in 24 countries where it is currently exported. With various new products including Disney Interactive Reading slated for release this year, it is poised to establish itself as a global representative edutech product‚Äù. ‚ñ≤ Introduction of ARpedia ARpedia, an experiential reading product that provides a three-dimensional reading experience through augmented reality (AR) technology, was launched in Korea in 2019 under the 'Interactive Book' brand. Targeting the international market, the English version of 'ARpedia' has received much acclaim and several global awards, including being the first Korean educational company to win the 'CES Innovation Award' three times in a row. In 2022 alone, ARpedia won the 'Kid‚Äôs Judge BETT', 'Mom‚Äôs Choice Award', and 'Teacher‚Äôs Choice Award', proving its success with children, parents, and teachers alike. In July 2023, Woongjin Thinkbig signed a licensing agreement with global entertainment giant Walt Disney for the launch of the Disney series. Video Link: https://www.youtube.com/embed/9BmORcfbQo8 Media Contact Company Name: WOONGJIN THINKBIG Contact Person: JR Kim Email: Send Email Country: South Korea Website: http://www.arpediabook.com

author: Ben Kenney
title: Wisconsin RB Braelon Allen a fantasy sleeper entering 2024 NFL season
text:
Former Wisconsin Badgers and current New York Jets running back Braelon Allen is one of ProFootballFocus‚Äô fantasy football sleeper rookie running backs entering the 2024 NFL season.
Allen was listed along with former Kentucky Wildcats and current Buffalo Bills RB Ray Davis, and former Clemson Tigers and current Philadelphia Eagles RB Will Shipley.
Related: Wisconsin and Big Ten bowl projections for 2024 college football season
Allen projects to be the primary backup to Jets starting running back Breece Hall in 2024. The bruising back should carve out a significant role in short-yardage and goal-line scenarios, especially given the fact that the team selected him in the fourth round of the recent NFL draft.
PFF notes that Allen is ‚Äòreportedly separating from his subpar in-house competition, flashing even as a pass-catcher.‚Äô It goes on to explain that ‚ÄòAllen has access to a high-volume, dual-threat No. 2 role‚Äô with ‚Äòformer pass-catching specialist Michael Carter now an Arizona Cardinal.‚Äô
The three-year starter in Madison enters the professional ranks after 597 carries, 3,494 yards and 35 touchdowns over those three seasons with the Badgers. He also added 49 catches for 275 receiving yards ‚Äî an aspect that he is reportedly working on to carve out a role with the Jets.
PFF also wrote the following about Allen‚Äôs sleeper status this season:
New York No. 1 running back Breece Hall notably worked on the sidelines during organized team activities (OTAs) after experiencing ‚Äú lower-body soreness ‚Äù entering Year 2 post-ACL reconstruction (ACLR) and meniscus trim. Allen would be a high-end must-start, should Hall miss time. Hall‚Äôs 82.5 PFF offense grade ranks sixth among 33 NFL running backs with at least 475 offensive snaps.
üò¥ Ray Davis, BUF
üò¥ Braelon Allen, NYJ
Fantasy Football Rookie RB Sleepers for the 2024 Season‚¨áÔ∏è https://t.co/IkyO0HTisI
‚Äî PFF College (@PFF_College) July 5, 2024
Allen will look to capitalize on what appears to be a golden opportunity in year one with the Jets when the season kicks off in early September.

author: Italo Lacerda
title: Hor√≥scopo de peixes para o m√™s de janeiro: sua mente est√° repleta de projetos
text:
O hor√≥scopo para este m√™s de janeiro est√° com in√∫meras previs√µes positivas para o signo de peixes. Agora vamos conferir as previs√µes para este signo para as mais diferentes √°reas da vida.
Hor√≥scopo do m√™s de janeiro para o signo de peixes Projetos com paix√£o e vis√£o a longo prazo
Peixes, sua mente est√° repleta de projetos que voc√™ defende com paix√£o, muitos deles projetados para o longo prazo. A capacidade de encantar, surpreender e conquistar aqueles que det√™m o poder √© evidente, contanto que suas iniciativas se mostrem realistas. No entanto, influenciar diretamente algu√©m pode n√£o gerar os resultados desejados.
Mergulho de cabe√ßa com apoio ativo
Voc√™ est√° disposto a mergulhar de cabe√ßa, superar obst√°culos e desfrutar do apoio ativo das pessoas ao seu redor. Ao longo do m√™s, voc√™ se sentir√° bem cercado e apreciado por todos. O uso do seu senso de humor se torna uma ferramenta valiosa para conquistar cora√ß√µes.
Encanto com originalidade e convic√ß√£o
Sua vis√£o ousada do futuro e projetos encantadores conquistar√£o todos ao seu redor. A originalidade, ideias incomuns e for√ßa de convic√ß√£o se tornam elementos poderosos em suas intera√ß√µes.
Seduzindo com humor e argumentos
Em relacionamentos, a falta de argumentos n√£o √© um problema para peixes. Use seu humor cativante para seduzir o parceiro, fazendo com que ele deseje seguir sua jornada √∫nica.
Energia e convic√ß√£o na persuas√£o
Solteiros de peixes podem confiar em sua energia e poder de convic√ß√£o para ganhar o apoio de amigos e familiares. A busca por algo diferente ou em outro lugar √© irresist√≠vel, e voc√™ n√£o hesita em compartilhar suas perspectivas.
Apoio financeiro para projetos inovadores
Se a necessidade de fundos surgir, conte com o apoio de pessoas que apreciam suas ideias originais e ousadas.
N√£o hesite em pedir ajuda para financiar seus projetos, pois seu c√≠rculo pr√≥ximo se mostrar√° receptivo.
Afirma√ß√£o de ambi√ß√µes no ambiente profissional
No ambiente profissional, peixes afirma suas ambi√ß√µes e convence colegas e superiores a embarcarem na aventura. Argumentos vigorosos e uma energia dedicada deixar√£o uma impress√£o duradoura, consolidando seu papel como l√≠der vision√°rio.
√â importante lembrar que o Hor√≥scopo √© apenas uma orienta√ß√£o e que cada indiv√≠duo tem o poder de moldar seu pr√≥prio destino. Use as previs√µes como um guia, mas lembre-se de seguir sua intui√ß√£o e tomar decis√µes que sejam melhores para voc√™
